blocks.name: pm10.541
blocks.content: Theorem *10.541 in [WhiteheadRussell] p. 155. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 24-May-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm pm10.541(setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wb(wal(s0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wo(w1, wal(s0, wi(w0, w2))))
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wal(s0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wo(w1, wal(s0, wi(w0, w2))), wal(s0, wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w2))), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wi(w0, w2))))
  bitri(wal(s0, wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w2))), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wi(w0, w2))), wal(s0, wi(wn(w1), wi(w0, w2))))
  albii(s0, wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w2)), wi(wn(w1), wi(w0, w2)))
  bi2.04(w0, wn(w1), w2)
  19.21v(s0, wn(w1), wi(w0, w2))
  albii(s0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wi(wn(w1), w2)))
  imbi2i(w0, wo(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w2))
  df-or(w1, w2)
  df-or(w1, wal(s0, wi(w0, w2)))
  diff.wn.s(s0, w1)
}

blocks.name: pm10.57
blocks.content: Theorem *10.57 in [WhiteheadRussell] p. 156. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 24-May-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm pm10.57(setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wo(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wex(s0, wa(w0, w2))))
} = {
  orrd(wal(s0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wex(s0, wa(w0, w2)))
  con1d(wal(s0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wex(s0, wa(w0, w2)))
  syl5bir(wal(s0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wn(wex(s0, wa(w0, w2))), wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wal(s0, wn(wa(w0, w2))))
  alnex(s0, wa(w0, w2))
  al2imi(s0, wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wn(wa(w0, w2)), wi(w0, w1))
  syl5bir(wi(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wn(wa(w0, w2)), wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wn(w2)))
  imnan(w0, w2)
  imim3i(w0, wo(w1, w2), wn(w2), w1)
  con1d(wo(w1, w2), w2, w1)
  pm2.53(w1, w2)
}
